forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally clear. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and thunderstorms. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly late. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 53F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
